original_title: The Bolshoi Ballet Collection - The Sleeping Beauty
overview: Based on the well known fairy tale, with a score by Tchaikovsky, the Sleeping Beauty is one of the world's best loved ballets. At her christening Princess Aurora is cursed by Carabosse. Lessened by the Lilac Fairy, Aurora is fated to plunge into a deep sleep for a hundred years but will be awakened by a prince's kiss.
tagline: The Bolshoi Ballet in Sleeping Beauty
title: The Bolshoi Ballet Collection - The Sleeping Beauty
